title: ★ UPDATED ★ 2 Bdrm in Belmont ★Avail 9/1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 23994413', 'Rent: $2,495 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'LANDLORD PAYS 50% BROKERS FEE!', ' This updated 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment is just minutes to Cambridge, Belmont Center and Fresh Pond.', 'Kitchen and bath have been recently updated with cherry cabinets, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.', 'Open floorplan with hardwood floor throughout.', 'Laundry is in the building.', 'Also included with the rent is one parking spot.', 'Half month brokerage fee.', 'Bus: 71 Mt Auburn St @ Saint Marys St (0.20 mi)', 'Bus: 73 Belmont St @ Sullivan Rd (0.08 mi)', 'Bus: 72/75 Huron Ave @ VFW Post 8818 (0.29 mi)', 'Bus: 72 Aberdeen Ave @ Huron Ave (0.41 mi)', 'FEATURES', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Building', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Parking Included in Rent', 'Joyce Fung', '267 218 5231', 'Benjamin Apartments, LLC', '107 Brighton Avenue', 'Boston, MA 02134', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
